FAQs

Who is Jay Z?

Jay Z is an American rapper, record producer, entrepreneur, born on 04 December, 1969 in Brooklyn, New York, U.S..

How old is Jay Z?

Jay Z is 54 years old as of February 2024.

How tall is Jay Z?

Jay Z is 616 feet 9 inches (188 m).
